Reviews.Title: Perfect for the money it cost ( 1/3 of an iphone)
Reviews.Author: nachotwin
Reviews.Content: This phone is very cool, it has 3gb of internal memory, 1 dedicated to apps, good RAM,  and the screen is ok.PROS:The money it cost, the RAM, the camera with led flash, (a little bit dark pics in the night but still OK), the OS ( 2.3.6 is very stable), the screen size is perfect, bigger than the iphone, the ACE, or the Mini, so you can type without problems.CONS:Too sensitive screen, I think it will improve with a screen protector. Would be better with ICE 4.0, but the Android 2.3.6 is still cool enough for me, with million of apps in the PLAY STORE.If you don't need a phone with a 2 or 4 cores processor, a trillions of pixels screen, and do not want to pay almost 1000 $ for a phone, i think this is one of the best options in the market right now.Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Rodoval507
Reviews.Content: I was a blackberry user and all I have to say is that this was a big change, although this is a mid range phone its very powerful regarding camera and speed. The apps are installed within 2-3 secs without having to reboot the phone like on blackberries, and it has great colors as well. The phone is not a Galaxy S2 or  S3 but it gets the job done !

Reviews.Title: Good phone, but problems with wifi...
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: I love Samsung Galaxy phones and had myself Galaxy S2 and now Galaxy Note, so I bought this one for my girlfriend. Everything works great, it's basicaly just smaller version of the Galaxy S2, however we encountered many problems with wifi. It keeps disconnecting for no reason. I am pretty sure the problem is with the phone, because I never had any issues on my phone, even we were connected to the same networks at the same time.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: Oscar Leon
Reviews.Content: I am rating here the product, not the seller: although i am a somehow fan of Apple products, i found this Samsung to be a very nice smartphone, i am beginning to get used to Android system and i have been with it for two weeks, so this is just my first impression of the product. What i really don't like is that it comes with several programs & icons preinstalled that honestly I WILL NOT USE in all my life, but i am not able to uninstall them either, unless i follow some procedures (i have found through the internet) that i'm not familiar doing and i don't like either to do... so i will have to live with these annoying icons in my cell phone.The other con is that it doesn't have a front camera, this was my mistake as i thought by the picture that it really had it.Buyers PLEASE BEWARE: although the description says it is a GT-S7500L model, the seller sent to me a different one (GT-S7500), so the 3G band is different... i originally bought this smartphone for my father, and his carrier works in 3G at 1900Mhz (the GT-S7500L model does it), but as i received the GT-S7500 model, he was not going to be able to connect to 3G because it only does it at 900Mhz and 2100Mhz!!! To avoid all the hassle of returning it, i kept this phone for myself as my carrier does work with 3G in 900Mhz. So, buyers, if you want to avoid problems please find out what band does your carrier work at 3G, and ask the seller which is the real model of smartphone they're selling. The seller in my case was HASSLEFREECELL (unfortunately, it was not hassle free to me).

Reviews.Title: telefono
Reviews.Author: omar uzcategui
Reviews.Content: muy buen articulo en excelentes condiciones funcionamiento optimo, una observacion importante es que el cargador vino malo!  tuve que comprar otro aquí!

Reviews.Title: this phone will not work for 3g speed in USA
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Iavelli
Reviews.Content: this is not a US phone, its a European model that works on 900/2100 hspa 3g freq, tmobile and Att use 1700 and 1900 hspa freq.

Reviews.Title: Me Gusta el Teléfono. Lo Uso en Venezuela / I Like This Cell Phone. I use it in Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Leonardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my wife who uses it in Venezuela with the operator Movistar. The phone was bought to the seller "HassleFreeCell". It's a nice phone, stylish, lightweight, with good speed and internal memory.The phone does not automatically connect to the data network Movistar. To connect it, the seller gave me information to manually enter the APN settings on the phone. I have been able to capture the signal EDGE but no 3G. With EDGE signal performs well for Whatsapp and use the email that is what my wife uses. This phone is selling in Movistar stores, so it should be able to connect to 3G networks.PROSAndroid OS 2.3.6 Gingerbread.Elegant, nice and good size. The weight is also suitable.Good speed, 3GB internal memory, 1GB for applications.The screen looks great.CONSUnlocked phone for Italian operator "TIM", so that the manuals and warranty are in Italian. This applies to the seller "HassleFreeCell", I don't know for other vendors.With the operator Movistar in Venezuela this phone does not automatically capture the data signal. You need to manually enter the APN settings.I recommend that if you buy this phone for use with Movistar in Venezuela, you must go to a technical service to configure it. If you have computer skills, you can search the internet for "Movistar APN settings" and enter it into the phone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Ace Plus S-7500 white unlocked international
Reviews.Author: Yawo Amenyona Ahama "AYA"
Reviews.Content: I would like to testify that this is a great phone...my wife loves it.It's really factory sealed with all the original accessories...knowing what i am talking about. It has been almost 3 months ago we had it, but no problema.

Reviews.Author: Qipeng
Reviews.Content: Samsung phones always have beautiful appearance. This phone is very good for girls. The only thing that I am not very satisfied is its resolution.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I have the phone for over a month now and i really think for the price you get a very good deal. It has good performance overall, sometimes crashes due to buggy apps  but with genuine Google play common apps like Facebook, messenger, free 3d racing games you get excellent rendering. I wish the screen could be made a little tougher like iphones but really for the price its ok.

Reviews.Content: I put 5 start because for the price rangem this is and Excelent phone.Things I Like: Great size, not too big, not too small, it is not heavy, the Android i enough for me, default ringtones are great, white color looks great, I use this with my SIM in Mexico to connect to telcel without problem.Things I dont like: Sometimes while using heavy Apps it feels slowI highly recomend this phone if you want an great looking Android phone for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Content: It met all my expectations, has a good processor and memory, Samsung quality!great for playing games, surfing the web, getting online, chatting, managing apps...I'm really satisfied

Reviews.Content: Product in good conditions but i received the wrong version of this cellphone.. I bought the GT-S7500L but i received the GT-S7500.. This version don't work on my country.

Reviews.Title: 3G won't work since it's an unlocked phone AND it came with a charger that didn't work!
Reviews.Author: Holly A Portner
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my son, since he is 12 years old and wanted a smart phone like all his little friends.  We have T-Mobile as our service plan...and they wanted my first born, DNA and mention in my last will and testament for a semi-decent new phone.  So I thought, ah, why not?  I'll try it out.  Afterall, it's only $245, it's not like I'm a single mom and live paycheck to paycheck...oh wait I do.  Oops.  Any who, my son opened this gem Christmas morn and his eyes lit up like a roman candle.  He was PUMPED!  A little later, as I was cleaning up the aftermath of my Christmas bonus, he came to me with a very disappointed look on his cherub face.  He told me his new, prized possession wouldn't charge.  I being the mother of the year that I am, took the charger from his little outstretched hand, only to find it didn't look like anything I had seen before.  It looked like the prongs seen on a naughty dogs' collar. But alas, I realized, A HA!!  It's a European outlet prong!  My dear child, please don't try to shove this in your outlet!  It was then he admitted that he had indeed, tried to shove it in his bedroom outlet.  UGH!!  I must admit, the phone DID come with an adapter...more like a cradapter...it didn't work.  To top it off, my poor little baby told me his 3G doesn't work!  He's having to deal with something called EDGE.  UGH!  Seriously!  The EDGE is NOT good enough for my sweet, innocent little baby!  In all seriousness, the phone was a great deal if you don't need a charger or fast internet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus

Reviews.Content: The product received is the same as described. I really am very pleased with my purchase and the seller is responsible and reliable. I recommend it 100%Package included: Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus Cell Phone (IUnlocked) Color White,  USB Cable, charger and adapter and Quick Start Guides.

Reviews.Content: Wonderful cellphone.Every day I find new featuresthat the phone is capable of.Very good product.I came from Blackberry and initially takes some getting used to the logic and the android menus. But after a few days, really  you love it.

Reviews.Title: It works in Mexico
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: HiI'm new with the smartphones and I was looking for a non expensive easy to use phone and this is perfect, I love it!!! Now I'm a big fan of Android and Samsung! The only thing, as other users wrote, is that the battery only last for a day or so but you have a lot of things that worth it. One of the doubts I had when I was looling for unlocked phone was if it would work in my country and I didn't found any reviews about it, that's why I'm writing, and yes it works perfectly in Mexico, so far no problems (1 day using it LOL), I just put my sim card and that's it. I bought it from Blutekusa.

Reviews.Content: Cellphone works very good, but the bandbase doesn't support 3G - 1900 MHZ, It works with 2100 / 850, maybe that need flash this bandbase for another that can be supported...
